94class cube
95{
96 public:
97 cube *children;
98 cubeext *ext;
99 union
100 {
101 uchar edges[12];
103 uint faces[3];
104 };
105 ushort texture[6];
106 ushort material;
107 uchar merged;
108 union
109 {
110 uchar escaped;
111 uchar visible;
112 };
119 bool isempty() const
120 {
121 return faces[0]==faceempty;
122 }
123
127 bool issolid() const
128 {
129 return faces[0]==facesolid &&
130 faces[1]==facesolid &&
131 faces[2]==facesolid; //check all three
132 }

181 struct facebounds
182 {
183 ushort u1, u2, v1, v2;
184
185 bool empty() const
186 {
187 return u1 >= u2 || v1 >= v2;
188 }
189 };
190 struct pvert
191 {
192 ushort x, y;
193
194 pvert() {}
195 pvert(ushort x, ushort y) : x(x), y(y) {}
196
197 bool operator==(const pvert &o) const
198 {
199 return x == o.x && y == o.y;
200 }
201 bool operator!=(const pvert &o) const
202 {
203 return x != o.x || y != o.y;
204 }
205 };
206
207 struct pedge
208 {
209 pvert from, to;
210
211 pedge() {}
212 pedge(const pvert &from, const pvert &to) : from(from), to(to) {}
213
214 bool operator==(const pedge &o) const
215 {
216 return from == o.from && to == o.to;
217 }
218 bool operator!=(const pedge &o) const
219 {
220 return from != o.from || to != o.to;
221 }
222 };
223
224 class plink : public pedge
225 {
226 public:
227 int polys[2];
228
229 plink()
230 {
231 clear();
232 }
233
234 plink(const pedge &p) : pedge(p)
235 {
236 clear();
237 }
238 private:
239 void clear()
240 {
241 polys[0] = polys[1] = -1;
242 }
243 };

290
294struct selinfo
295{
296 int corner;
297 int cx, cxs, cy, cys;
298 ivec o,
299 s;
300 int grid,
301 orient;
302 selinfo() : corner(0), cx(0), cxs(0), cy(0), cys(0), o(0, 0, 0), s(0, 0, 0), grid(8), orient(0) {}
303
313 int size() const
314 {
315 return s.x*s.y*s.z;
316 }
317
325 int us(int d) const
326 {
327 return s[d]*grid;
328 }
329
337 bool operator==(const selinfo &sel) const
338 {
339 return o==sel.o && s==sel.s && grid==sel.grid && orient==sel.orient;
340 }
341
347 bool validate()
348 {
349 extern int worldsize;
350 if(grid <= 0 || grid >= worldsize)
351 {
352 return false;
353 }
354 if(o.x >= worldsize || o.y >= worldsize || o.z >= worldsize)
355 {
356 return false;
357 }
358 if(o.x < 0)
359 {
360 s.x -= (grid - 1 - o.x)/grid;
361 o.x = 0;
362 }
363 if(o.y < 0)
364 {
365 s.y -= (grid - 1 - o.y)/grid;
366 o.y = 0;
367 }
368 if(o.z < 0)
369 {
370 s.z -= (grid - 1 - o.z)/grid;
371 o.z = 0;
372 }
373 s.x = std::clamp(s.x, 0, (worldsize - o.x)/grid);
374 s.y = std::clamp(s.y, 0, (worldsize - o.y)/grid);
375 s.z = std::clamp(s.z, 0, (worldsize - o.z)/grid);
376 return s.x > 0 && s.y > 0 && s.z > 0;
377 }
378};
379
385struct block3
386{
387 ivec o, s;
388 int grid, orient;
389 block3() {}
390 block3(const selinfo &sel) : o(sel.o), s(sel.s), grid(sel.grid), orient(sel.orient) {}
391
392 cube *c()
393 {
394 return reinterpret_cast<cube *>(this+1);
395 }
396
397 int size() const
398 {
399 return s.x*s.y*s.z;
400 }
401};

405 block3 *copy;
406 editinfo() : copy(nullptr) {}
407};

409struct undoent
410{
411 int i;
412 entity e;
413};
414
415struct undoblock
416{
417 undoblock *prev, *next;
418 int size,
419 timestamp,
420 numents;
422 block3 *block()
423 {
424 return reinterpret_cast<block3 *>(this + 1);
425 }
426
427 uchar *gridmap()
428 {
429 block3 *ub = block();
430 return reinterpret_cast<uchar *>(ub->c() + ub->size());
431 }
432
433 undoent *ents()
434 {
435 return reinterpret_cast<undoent *>(this + 1);
436 }
437};

444inline void setcubefaces(cube &c, uint face)
445{
446 c.faces[0] = c.faces[1] = c.faces[2] = face;
447}

449#define EDGE_GET(edge, coord) ((coord) ? (edge)>>4 : (edge)&0xF)
450#define EDGE_SET(edge, coord, val) ((edge) = ((coord) ? ((edge)&0xF)|((val)<<4) : ((edge)&0xF0)|(val)))
451
452#define CUBE_EDGE(c, d, x, y) ((c).edges[(((d)<<2)+((y)<<1)+(x))])
453
454inline int octadim(int d)
455{
456 return 1<<d;
457}
458
459//note that these macros actually loop in the opposite order: e.g. loopxy runs a for loop of x inside y
460#define LOOP_XY(b) for(int y = 0; y < (b).s[C[DIMENSION((b).orient)]]; ++y) for(int x = 0; x < (b).s[R[DIMENSION((b).orient)]]; ++x)
461#define LOOP_XYZ(b, r, f) { for(int z = 0; z < (b).s[D[DIMENSION((b).orient)]]; ++z) LOOP_XY((b)) { cube &c = blockcube(x,y,z,b,r); f; } }
462#define LOOP_SEL_XYZ(f) { if(local) makeundo(); LOOP_XYZ(sel, sel.grid, f); rootworld.changed(sel); }
463#define SELECT_CUBE(x, y, z) blockcube(x, y, z, sel, sel.grid)
464
465// guard against subdivision
466#define PROTECT_SEL(f) { undoblock *_u = newundocube(sel); f; if(_u) { pasteundoblock(_u->block(), _u->gridmap()); freeundo(_u); } }
467
468#define DIMENSION(orient) ((orient)>>1)
469#define DIM_COORD(orient) ((orient)&1)

611 static struct emptycube : cube
612 {
613 emptycube()
614 {
615 children = nullptr;
616 ext = nullptr;
617 visible = 0;
618 merged = 0;
619 material = 0;
620 setcubefaces(*this, faceempty);
621 for(int i = 0; i < 6; ++i)
622 {
623 texture[i] = 0;
624 }
625 }
626 } emptycube;

628 struct mapheader
629 {
630 char magic[4]; // "TMAP"
631 int version; // any >8bit quantity is little endian
632 int headersize; // sizeof(header)
633 int worldsize;
634 int numents;
635 int numpvs; // no longer used, kept for backwards compatibility
636 int blendmap; // also no longer used
637 int numvars;
638 int numvslots;
639 };
640
641 struct octaheader
642 {
643 char magic[4]; // "OCTA"
644 int version; // any >8bit quantity is little endian
645 int headersize; // sizeof(header)
646 int worldsize;
647 int numents;
648 int numvars;
649 int numvslots;
650 };

664};

666extern cubeworld rootworld;
667
668struct undolist
669{
670 undoblock *first, *last;
671
672 undolist() : first(nullptr), last(nullptr) {}
673
674 bool empty() { return !first; }
675
676 void add(undoblock *u)
677 {
678 u->next = nullptr;
679 u->prev = last;
680 if(!first)
681 {
682 first = last = u;
683 }
684 else
685 {
686 last->next = u;
687 last = u;
688 }
689 }
690
691 undoblock *popfirst()
692 {
693 undoblock *u = first;
694 first = first->next;
695 if(first)
696 {
697 first->prev = nullptr;
698 }
699 else
700 {
701 last = nullptr;
702 }
703 return u;
704 }
705
706 undoblock *poplast()
707 {
708 undoblock *u = last;
709 last = last->prev;
710 if(last)
711 {
712 last->next = nullptr;
713 }
714 else
715 {
716 first = nullptr;
717 }
718 return u;
719 }
720};
